title: Growlanser IV: Wayfarer of the Time
synopsis: A promotional ova that came with the PS2 game, Growlanser IV Returns which is an add-on featuring a compilation of three short stories that is told in visual novel style.
characters: ['Frane', 'Silvernale, Dianna', 'Tippi', 'Liedbulk, Orpheus', 'Misha', 'Rems', 'Langley, Karen', 'Langley, Xenos', 'Cruz, Wein', 'Bearnt, Hans']
staff: [['Murata, Masahiko', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Nishimura, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Urushihara, Satoshi', ['Original Character Design']], ['Takami, Akio', ['Key Animation']]]
